Hydras:

"Yess" hissed the Predacon comander while he sent a landing coordinates to 
an old semi abandoned Predacon base"I have a temporal refuge, I want that as 
soon as we arrive there, you figure out how to cover our signatures while we 
are there and check the CRs, our wounded would need repairs while i do a 
final arrangement to our final bassse"

-----Original Message----- 
From: supercyclonus
Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2011 1:36 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Falling Back!

As the Predacons move off, they too feel the heat and breath of the 
explosion behind them, but for them it has a very different meaning, they 
are now without a home, without a place to return to.

Cyclonus flew up next to Hydras, his boosters flaring brightly in the skies 
as he maneuvered himself.

As Cyclonus talked Scourge fell back to the other Predacons, falling even 
with the massive form of Deepstryke who was still in gun mode. Phobia and 
the other sweeps fell in with the groups, leaving many of the more ground 
based Predaons sitting in the shuttle that had picked them up.

"Sir" Cyclonus said to Hydras as he flew along side him, "do you have some 
where to go, some destination in mind for us?" He asked curiously. "With 
your base destroyed we have no fall back position."

(TAG)

Preston
